attributes.action: Recommend Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean for Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Knighthood recommendation for the legendary skating duo Torvill and Dean. Well deserved for their Sporting achievments, contribution to charity, sport and British society. 

We have had many successful sportsmen and women awarded Knighthoods for their achievements, but none have been as successful as this pair.

It is time they got the award they deserve - a fitting reward for their 25th Anniversary of Bolero.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
